Title: Relates to the amount of security deposit that a landlord may charge a tenant
Summary: Relates to the amount of security deposit that a landlord may charge a tenant; prohibits landlords from requiring a security deposit in excess of an amount equal to two months' rent.
LawCode: Amd ยง7-108, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to the amount of security deposit that a landlord may charge a tenant
